website_summaries.verdict: A few more perks than the Watts but still a basic model.
pros: Includes a pre-filter that helps prevent clogging
Suitable for areas with lots of sediment and silt
cons: Like the Watts, limited filtration prevents all harmful elements from being eliminated

customer_reviews.title: No replacement O-Rings Available!!!
customer_reviews.text: Provides excellent great tasting water. However, you might as well plan on about a 2-3 year life span for this product. The problem is with the o-rings. They will fail after about 2-3 years and leak profusely. This is just a fact of life with o-rings. However, I contacted the manufacturer and they do not offer replacement o-rings. They did, however, offer their condolences and said that if I had only paid for a filter subscription, they could have sent me new canisters with new o-rings. The o-rings and canisters cannot be purchased separately. Other manufacturers sell o-rings for approximately $5 to $8 per set. If I were you, I would purchase another brand.
customer_reviews.author: BGW

customer_reviews.title: Leaks right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The filters work great, it looks nice. Installation is easy (if you haven't worked with PEX before, make sure to cut the ends of the tubing square and remove any burrs) and takes only a few minutes. However, it leaks. Not from the tubes or any fitting or the filters, the faucet itself drips. This is unacceptable for a new faucet. If the leak was due to my mistake (improper installation, not fully seating the tubing, etc.) this would probably have gotten 5 stars. With the leak due to poor quality on the manufacturer's part, and the fact that the drip costs money in wasted water and the environmental cost of wasted water, it gets 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS EVERY TIME FILTERS CHANGED.
customer_reviews.text: Every time we change the filters the entire thing leaks. We have been about to stop the leaking three times. Now the 4th time we have replaced the filters there is nothing we can do to stop the leaking. What a waste of $200 plus. HORRIBLE product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap escutton! Plumber installed one month ago and came back to tighten today (09/02/16). The escutton cracked in six places. Unit is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Eggert

customer_reviews.title: Warning!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT BUY!! This has flooded my kitchen twice now. First time I contacted Aquasana and they said I needed replacement filters, I replaced them for a pretty penny, then 3 less than three months later, my son woke me up in the middle of the night - noone had even been running the water - to tell me the kitchen was flooded again. water was spraying out of the unit. it warped my floor and ruined my cabinet. I had to take the whole unit out of the house. I have contacted aquasana to refund my recent purchase of filters, but I think I should also get a refund for the unit. I would not purchase this item!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kelbear

customer_reviews.title: Removes Chloramines, Economical to Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Aquasana primarily because it removes chloramines (chlorine and ammonia), which most water purifiers don't. Some purifiers remove chlorine, but not chloramines. Most larger cities use chloramines instead of free chlorine as a disinfectant to reduce the formation of carcinogenic disinfectant byproducts (DBPs). The Aquasana also does a good job of removing over 60 other contaminants, The Aquasana is also economical to use as it treats up to 600 gallons of water before the filters need replacing, which are comparatively inexpensive at $65. One minor negative is that the flow is somewhat low, so it might take 10 seconds to fill a glass of water instead of 3 seconds straight out of the tap.
customer_reviews.author: Delbert Grady

customer_reviews.title: the water quality had depleted to worst. When you make tea
customer_reviews.text: I installed the system on Dec 14 2017, the water quality had depleted to worst. When you make tea, you get brownish sediments just like tap water. The water just taste like daily tap water. Please note, we only use the water for tea, coffee and daily drinking for family of three, and do not use the water excessively. Obviously Aquasana 3 stage is a very poor quality product. Please do not buy this system you are wasting time, money and installation fee. 0
customer_reviews.author: chaigoi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tasting water! No waste
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much I purchased one for my parents as a gift. It makes southern California water taste great, which is a big thing! I used to use Berkey filters and when I switched to that from Brita, the Berkey tasted great! But after using this for some time, I tried the Berkey at my parents house and I couldn't stand the taste. So I had to gift this - speaks a lot! Great customer service too - I had a housing that was broken and called them and they sent one right away.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Great filtered water and easy install
customer_reviews.text: After years of expensive water delivery service or battling with limited refill systems at certain businesses, I decided to give this system a try. WOW. Water is delicious, flow is adequate for filling my 3 gal bottles for use in my hot/cold dispenser, and the install was super easy. Instructions were clear and concise. I am a pretty handy female but have limited plumbing experience. With a few basic tools, I had this installed in about an hour. Some reviews indicated that the unit would eventually leak, but what plumbing device doesn't eventually leak. It's the nature of water. I love this unit and will gladly pay to replace and reinstall if this happens to mine. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems.
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend, I’ve had this for 1.5 years. At first it was good, then after I changed the filter for the first time it was horrible, it came over very slowly and I had my plumber fix it. He ended up having to blow the lines out with compressed air. now it just doesn’t even work at all!!! Do not buy, it should work for the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Best unit ever!
customer_reviews.text: I had an RO unit by Aquasana that sat on my countertop. I had that unit for at least 15 years. Replaced filters diligently. But, decided to finally upgrade to this unit and glad I did. I had a plumber install it for me while he was installing a new kitchen faucet. The 3-stage filter is AWESOME compare to the 2-stage I used to have. The water tastes real clean and refreshing! Plus, I love the fact that all I have to do is turn the lever and there is purified water!
customer_reviews.author: birdlady

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like bottled water.
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product in June. The installation was simple but some people may not be so handy so I would suggest watching a video of the installation. As for the water, tastes like bottled water. I have spent so much money in buying bottled water and stressed myself about the environment even though I recycle. I searched the internet for reviews countless of hours and found the Aquasana. It is indeed a great filter system and I have saved myself money and I am stress free. You can change the filters after 6 months but if you don't drink that much water then you don't need to. Think of your environment. Try Aquasana.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Pol

customer_reviews.title: Best under the sink filter
customer_reviews.text: Great filter! I bought this for our summer home. Have the older 2 stage version installed at regular house. The older one is great and has provided many years and gallons of great waster. This new 3 stage has much better flow. It fills the same glass jug at least twice as fast. Same clean, clear and good tasting water. Installation is easy. I suggest getting a cutoff valve for the inlet tubing - it makes changing out the filters easier.
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Does not filter enough.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to filter out well water issues. It does not filter out any of the hard water/mineral taste or smell. Maybe I purchased the wrong kind of system so take that into account. I have also noticed that the filters are very sensitive to position. If fully twisted into place, the water stops flowing. I have to back off from fully seated about 1/16" to get the water flowing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Petras

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy. Makes for a good cup of tea.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the filters three times now, every six months seems to be good. Let it go too long and it will end up tasting sludgy and undrinkable. Have to let it run 10-15 minutes to get the bad taste out of the new filters. Never had a leak or any problems with the unit. Provides water that is virtually tasteless. If you like a little mineral taste to your water, reverse osmosis may be a better choice for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting filtered water out of Aquasana.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used our home water for years because of the metal taste and bitter, Installed this Aquasana and the water taste great. The water pressure at our house is minimal and seen in the that this unit produces .5 gallons under good water pressure, still did OK with poor pressure and I am most likely getting 1/2 of that. So if you think your going to get tap pressure out of this filter your not. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH KOLB

customer_reviews.title: Generally satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am quite happy with the result. The water test better but using a simple water tester does not show the quality of bottled water. I think I would have to go through a broader test to see has better my water has become. But I believe it’s better now and it’s only a small filter system anyway. For a bigger one I would not have space. That brings me to the installation. It is not as easy as thought and shown in the videos if the working space is limited to handle installation. Also the images in the manual are not in a good solution so it was difficult to identify some of the components without a magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: Rolf Wiegel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the taste of the water!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the filter!!! The water tastes great!!!! My challenge is that I was shipped a brushed chrome faucet with a shiny stainless steal knob. I went straight to Aquasauna to replace the knob. They were great and shipped a new faucet immediately. Double work to get under the sink a 2nd time to replace the faucet...reason for only 3 stars. You really do have to review the products when you get them.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works great
customer_reviews.text: I hooked this up within an hour. It would have been 30 minutes but I had to cut out another hole in my granite counter top. Its been running great for about 2 months now with no leaks. So I'm pretty happy with it. The taste of water isn't that great but the water coming in isn't that great either.... So crap in crap out but cleaner. I use this for my coffee machine and to cook with. Getting gallons of water from the store was getting ridiculous and this made is it simple and accessible right in my sink.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Unit busted after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this product. After 3 years of owning, two of the three housings for the filters busted, flooding my kitchen. Unit has a faulty design build and there's no telling when this will happen to your unit. I tried calling about getting replacement housings, but customer service wouldn't work with me at all, despite the issue being their faulty build and me being a loyal customer, buying their branded filters every 6 months. I strongly recommend everyone stay away from this product, as the company isn't getting a cent more from me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Neri

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap quality, stay away
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an existing old system with this one. The faucet looks like it was picked up from Dollar store - cheap and half plastic. The knob to turn on/off the water is good for small kid's hands. The water flow is average (my incoming water pressure is over 60psi). Also there is too much bubbles coming out. The glass looks cloudy when filled. I didn't have this issue with the existing one. Bottom line STAY AWAY. The system is not worth more than $50. I had already installed it and hence decided not return it to avoid hassles.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ferrant

customer_reviews.title: ... months now I'm confident enough to say it's a great item and the water tastes great
customer_reviews.text: After having used this for several months now I'm confident enough to say it's a great item and the water tastes great. Some people have said in their reviews the flow is very slow but I have not found this to be the case. I've noticed no cloudiness in the water, whether chilled or allowed to sit at room temperature. We're using it for refilling water bottles and ice cube trays and love the taste. Installation was extremely easy (though depending on your counter/sink setup you may need someone to hold the faucet in place while you tighten it under the sink). Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Blair

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Tasting Water
customer_reviews.text: I had this system installed today and workmen said it was fast and efficient. It replaced one I had from 20 years ago that you changed filter every 3 years but this water tastes much better. Looks easy to change the filters so that is a plus. Amazon prices were the best around town compared to big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: After SIX months we still love it.
customer_reviews.text: Filters work just as advertised. I only connected mine to the refrigerator but it delivers clear odor free ice and water. I removed the built in filter that is really a joke and could not remove the chlorine our local water company insists on adding to what seems are like extreme levels. Keep in mind that this does not have a holding tank like an RO system so you do lose some pressure but if you are on town water or have a good well system it is more than adequate. I just changed the filters after 6 months and it is an easy job with very good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A

customer_reviews.title: easy to remove/add filter sets
customer_reviews.text: Fits in place very well, easy to remove/add filter sets. Faucet was simple and nice design. Water taste is very good and the flow through is just fine for us. Make sure to really tighten down the hose connect to faucet. Had the hose fall off after 2 week installed and was lucky to have been at sink or else the flood would have been a disaster. Those white plastic lines are not the best so make sure to really tighten down the connection. I consider the fault to be owner/operator error however just make sure its really good and tight and check on it now and then just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water!
customer_reviews.text: Unit is just what I wanted so I can have great tasting water and avoid buying purified water in plastic containers that have BPA's. Fairly easy installation. Only problem is the filter cable under the sink gets in the way of my waste can. I will have to do something to keep that filter cable up and out of the way. Also I installed where the soap dispenser hole was in my granite. The faucet is a little loose so that the edges of the hole can be seen at times. I will need to get a larger brushed nickel plate to fit over the hole and adjust but that should not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Black

customer_reviews.title: good value for price
customer_reviews.text: I like the filter system, it was easy to install and it's easy to replace the cartridges. Even thought he latter is a bit expensive. After 4 years of 'heavy' use the faucet started to drip. I replaced it with "ESOW Kitchen Water Filter Faucet" (ASIN B07787L89H)
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love it . Water never tasted so good. I have city water and it has a noticeable chlorine level. Just be sure to realize that the filtered water is rated at 1/2 gallon per minute. So It takes 2 minutes to fill a gallon jug. I wouldn't care if it took 10 minutes or even longer, as long as the water tasted this good. I never really knew what clean , healthy, delicious water tasted like until I bought this system. Again, I Love it.
customer_reviews.author: 600ydsplus

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy with the unit at all, Never again from Aquasana **
customer_reviews.text: Water doesn't taste right, after having a cup of tea leaves a film stain on the glass, whereas using bottled water or previous water filter from a different manufacturer where I bought from Costco never did. The warranty specifies 365 days from the date of purchase and 90 days 100% satisfaction guaranteed. After reaching to the support they had the same report, I call it ( complain ) that leaves a film residue behind after a cup of tea. ** Since I bought this from Amazon not direct from them Aquasana that disqualifies me from the 90 Days 100% satisfaction guarantee. **
customer_reviews.author: Ray Hakopian

customer_reviews.title: I used an osmosis type water purifier for years but ...
customer_reviews.text: I used an osmosis type water purifier for years but the filter of it was discontinued that I had to find a new one. After reading all the positive reviews I chose Aquasana. I regret the decision. I don't feel any difference between the regular tap water. I even checked the water quality with a TDS water tester. The number of the purified water was even higher than the regular tap water. It is ridiculous. I disassembled the unite several times to see if I made any mistake when I installed it. Nope. Don't buy it. Find something else.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, did not take up much room under the sink. Water taste great and we feel that we are now getting a better quality of water for drinking and cooking. We also take gallon size containers of the filtered water on our camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Worst filter ever
customer_reviews.text: After 2.5 years one filter casings broke - be aware this is very common, check other reviews - my kitchen was flood and need to repair my wood floor, it costs a fortune. Still I gave them an opportunity and 2 weeks ago after a filter replacement there were leaks in all casing DO NOT Purchase it, it is the worst investment that I have done, I regret do not choose a better one, it cost me much more!
customer_reviews.author: cpcv76

customer_reviews.title: Good filter but the specific item was damaged
customer_reviews.text: Got it used so this review is my own experience. I got it from a 3rd party seller on Amazon. Two pieces were damaged and the water feeding tube to the faucet keeps coming loose and flooding the area under the sink. I had one before at my old house years ago and did not have this problem. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Very good water
customer_reviews.text: I actually had a plumber install it. I don't think it is easy to install unless you have experience in that kind of thing. The water tastes fresh and clean. The spout has leaked a bit recently. The primary reason for one of these is the water quality. That is why I give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: P. Solberg

customer_reviews.title: Beter this filter than your kidneys.
customer_reviews.text: Either your kidneys are filtering your water or this is. Have recently done the replacement filters and the water continues to be awesome. Easily installed kit. Have recommended the Aquasana system to my office clients and family. We live in an area that has a history of environmental failures (excessive chemical fluoridation and chlorination, cancer clusters, etc) so this is a must have. Flavor is "pure water" no smell, no color... even the ice cubes come out clear.
customer_reviews.author: RRochet

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: I installed this unit in 2018 and have not had an issue since. I did sign up for the water for life program through the aqua sauna website. I have not had to use their lifetime warranty yet but it is nice to know I have it. The water from this unit taste great and even outperforms my refrigerator. The half a gallon per minute is sufficient but if I were to do it again I may look at purchasing the larger unit with higher flow rate. It would save some time when filling up the tea kettle. First world problems I guess...
customer_reviews.author: K. Haley

customer_reviews.title: I have been using Aquasana products for years, just ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Aquasana products for years, great quality and customer service, just moved so I got one for my new place. I left the previous one with a new set of filters for the buyer of my old home
customer_reviews.author: Sean Balasuriya Realtor®️

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Pretty straightforward to install (though I had to go to OSH for longer versions of water tubing they include, as I wanted filter further from spigot than intended). Water tastes good. Flows a little slower than I expected. But when I actually measured it, it was pretty much exactly what filter is rated at, 0.5 gpm. And unlike reverse osmosis units, this one doesn't waste water or strip healthy minerals from it (and our city water is already pretty good, this is just a little extra protection).
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: We went from a reverse osmosis under counter system to the Aquasana. The RO ran constantly and, although the increase wasn't too significant, our water bill remained higher than we felt it should. Requiring the help of a friend instead of paying a plumber, the Aquasana wasn't too difficult to install. I'm perfectly satisfied with the taste of the water and feel it's filtering the unwanted elements.
customer_reviews.author: Coolj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel Trailer! *but replace fittings*
customer_reviews.text: We added this filter to our RV. The spout is quality as well as the housing and filters, but the connections should NOT be used in a travel trailer (its not the intended purpose for this model) but it works. Suggest replacing fittings with the SharkBite product line... you don't want the compression ones they include in your RV... a water leak will be costly! Water tastes food, installation was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona3rdGen

customer_reviews.title: Filtered water straight from the tap will change your habits
customer_reviews.text: Say goodbye to bottled water. Getting glass of clean water straight from the tap is priceless. Once you have easy access to filtered water you start finding so many more uses for it. You may want to leave the water sitting for awhile to let the chlorine evaporate, but other than that it's perfect. Also, I'd suggest buying 1 gallon glass jugs to store in the fridge. I saw some for $10 and they're better than the tiny glass bottles and keep the taste better than any open pitcher could. Also, you don't want to filter water just to dump it into a plastic container.
customer_reviews.author: B. Igiri

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit in 2016. Seemed to work okay until last night. Last night, one of the filter containers split open at the bottom and flooded the cabinet. This would have been a expensive disaster if I hadn't happened upon it before bed. No excuse for such poor quality plastics. 24 months for $160 and expensive refills......I don't think so.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for city water with chloramines
customer_reviews.text: So far so good- hooked it up today at my son's house that has city water with Chloramine- yuk! Easy install (as far as easy under sinks goes) and simple. Nice faucet- good quality- lucky for me there was already a hole near the sink. I think its a bad idea to install anywhere else- what if your cat gets up there and trips the faucet open? Anyway- after 10 min flush- water is odorless!!! BTV water is undrinkable otherwise, IMO. So now he can save by not having to buy bottled water or water for the dispenser. Nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P Walker

customer_reviews.title: Filter housing cracked and flooded the house.
customer_reviews.text: Filter housing cracked and flooded the house. Do yourself a favor and pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: VinnieP

customer_reviews.title: Helping tips for installation
customer_reviews.text: It is the good filter, but buyers should know somethings to install it without problems: 1. You need 1" drill to install faucet 2. "T" type connectors for cold water hose that included in package are 3/8" size, so if you have 1/2" size in your kitchen as I have, you going to buy connectors (everything can be bought online or in closest HomeDepot, there are free water tests too)
customer_reviews.author: Abner Bendir

customer_reviews.title: Good filter as advertized
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great but is fairly slow filling I can fill a 32 oz in about a min but It does a great job of filtering make sure you run it for about 25 min after installing filters or you get kinda a metallic taste. I also hooked to my ice maker works as advertised the reason it's slow is the line is quarter inch. It was easy to install took me 20 min plus another 30 going to the hardware store for extras on ice maker.
customer_reviews.author: Mrotho

customer_reviews.title: Flooded house
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product over 2 years ago. Worked great until the plastic casing burst and flooded my house at night. Water damage in my kitchen cabinets, ruined wood floors in the kitchen and living room, and water pouring into the backyard when I woke up in the morning. Water pressure at my house is not too high, around 40 psi after the PRV. Just a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great water system
customer_reviews.text: Our old 3 stage filter developed a leak so a replacement was necessary. Despite the leak, I took a great deal of time researching water systems and I am glad that I did. This system was easy to install and the water tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Tsuyoi

customer_reviews.title: Leaking right out of the box - BAD
customer_reviews.text: Cannot recommend. Leaking. That is the number one thing you DON'T want after installing a water filtration system. I have one of the filters leaking at the factory joint. Called them and emailed. Cannot get any response.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Under sink water filter
customer_reviews.text: After installing water filter, water was bubbly and had some slight flavor. After a few days air bubbles were gone and water tasted fine. Like that water filter saves time in filling gallons and space.
customer_reviews.author: yadira miranda

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Something gave way inside and flooded my kitchen and basement. Insurance is picking up the thousands to fix everything. DO NOT BUY!!! It is only 3 years old and this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not everyone likes the taste
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and installation was not hard .taste it is Not great and my kids are refusing to drink water from this filter :-( and we I just noticed something if use the water for ice cubes 🧊. When it melts we notice something floating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do you like clean water?
customer_reviews.text: The taste and smell difference in the waterbefore and after installing this filter is remarkable. In fact this one was installed for my mom because I was so happy with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Thor Larsen

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Such a bad product. had to call for help for installation . after installation we have no idea it is working or not. NO INDICATOR, same bad taste and color.. No idea on when to replace... Called in support , they say we have to send the water for testing to lab every time we need to verify the water is being filtered or believe that ur water is good. Even the cheapest pitcher filters have indicators to show when to replace
customer_reviews.author: Sims

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is an great water purifier for folks who don't have tons of room for a reverse osmosis machine under the kitchen sink or on the counter. It is easy to install and the water has a wonderful clean taste. I read many revues before choosing this product and am very satisfied with Aquasana. I will have to see how often the filters need replacing as they are not cheap;however, healthwise I think the system is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: reneer

customer_reviews.title: WATER TASTE IS GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THIS SO MUCH I WILL BE GETTING ANOTHER ONE FOR MY OTHER HOME EASY TO INSTALL AND WATER TASTES MUCH BETTER THEN THE ONE I HAVE GREAT VALUE FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Sabia

customer_reviews.title: Great water filtration system.
customer_reviews.text: Great filtration system. I don't understand a few of the comments talking about leaks. If you don't put the filters on correctly or install the plumbing securely, any system will leak. We used to always install reverse osmosis systems but they waste more water than they produce. I recommend this system. I only wish the replacement filters were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Sky

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't we do this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: Our son installed one of these filters in his home, which ultimately led to our purchase. How simple to now turn the spigot to get filtered water instead of repeatedly having to refill the Britta pitcher. Our sink came with a hole for a hand soap dispenser, so replacing that with the filtered water "faucet" was very simple. A great trade in our minds!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Works well and water tastes good.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and water tastes good. The only reason for 4 stars is that the water flow is slow. This is not a big problem overall. The faucet fits the existing hole in my Kohler sink. I wish the base of the faucet were about a 1/4 inch bigger diameter but it just works. Looks good and was easy to install. I will now take the PUR filter pitcher out of my refrigerator and give it to my daughter for her house. Gives me more storage now.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Great filter system
customer_reviews.text: This filter system works awesome I have it set up for my sink and I've also run a line from this filter to my icemaker so will pre-filter the water going in before uses the small filters in the ice maker. I highly recommend this filter system for anybody who needs a better solution than having a Britta filter. It was also very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Justin H.

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water and Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: I moved to a new place in June and installed this right away. I love the taste of the water. Also, I like the high neck on the faucet and the color of the faucet. It is nice looking and was very easy to install. Neither of us are plumbers, although we are quite handy around the house, and this was easy. I read the instructions and set it up while he removed the sprayer and we quickly switched them out.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lamont

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this product. It took me a long time to research and ultimately decided on the Aquasana under the sink water system. Very easy to install, and the faucet is very nice and seems of good quality. I haven't had the water tested yet, but it's clear and free of any odor or taste. The water flows a little slow, but I expected that since it has to travel through the filters. Very pleased. I am wondering if the hoses need to be replaced after awhile. I didn't read anything about that.
customer_reviews.author: Piera Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great System!
customer_reviews.text: Although the unit and replacement cartridges are a bit pricey, this unit was easy to install and does a great job removing chlorine from our city water.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E. Sonne

customer_reviews.title: The system was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this filter system installed for about one week, but so far, I am very impressed. We were getting our water from a deep well, and hauling six gallons of water back to our home, where the containers ate up space on our kitchen counter. The system was easy to install, and after splitting the filtered water supply with my ice maker everything is good.
customer_reviews.author: Hackerignap

customer_reviews.title: Slow Water Flow
customer_reviews.text: I will say that the water from this filter tastes great. But the flow is slow, even with brand new filter cartridges, And the filter last only about 3 months before the flow gets intolerably slow, not six months like they say. I would buy a different filter to replace this one except that we paid a plumber to install it. I have arthritis, so it's hard for me to use wrenches under the sink. I should have heeded the reviews warning of slow flow problems.
customer_reviews.author: Love-a-great-tool

customer_reviews.title: Good for Awhile, then massive leaks
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 3 years and on the last filter change leaks started from multiple places. Going to replace it with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Onepersons

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a Brita fill and drip and was just tired of waiting for modest amounts of drinking water. I decided to make the investment and I have been extremely happy. I immediately noticed clarity in water taste and smell. So refreshing, and it's comforting to know my family is consuming three-stage filtered water. The system was easy to install, and filter life is an average six months. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Filter cartridge failure - serious water leak
customer_reviews.text: I have a AQ-5300 water filter and its mounted under the kitchen sink. I have been using this unit for about one year. Three days ago the Sediment Pre-filter began leaking out the bottom of the cartridge and not a few drops, but a stream. I notice the bottom of this cartridge has a slight bulge with a crack at the very bottom. This caused a big water problem in the kitchen. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: j martin

customer_reviews.title: Might consider something else
customer_reviews.text: Did not notice much difference in water quality...filters go out before 6 mo and are not cheap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: has great flow and we all love it
customer_reviews.text: This is not only gorgeous but it does not leak (husband installed it thanks to the helpful post on Amazon about the installation instructions!) I could never have installed it but if you are handy, give it a try! Otherwise hire someone but it is cute, does not leak, has great flow and we all love it.
customer_reviews.author: make time to enjoy

customer_reviews.title: great purifier.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water purfier. instalation was very easy. and the hardware looked to be very well made and high quality. I will add that you need to be careful as to how tight you screw togerher the filter housing, too tight and it may overcompress the O-ring and cause it to leak. backing off can fix this issue. water taste is great.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoTrains

customer_reviews.title: which of course I like less. It should save me water consumption and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a Rev Osmosis filter. This one leaves more of the tap water taste, which of course I like less. It should save me water consumption and the main reason I bought was because it supposedly does a better job at filtering lead and other stuff. I sure hope that's true...
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: problematic
customer_reviews.text: Filter housings often leaked and needed to be installed and reinstalled repeatedly to stop the drip. Filter quality is flimsy and light. After 3 years, it has finally completely clogged itself by pushing its filter charcoal into its sealed plastic body. RIP
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY SLOW water after the filter. Filters OK but takes a long time to get a drink
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey holshouser

customer_reviews.title: water tastes great. easy to install with plumber
customer_reviews.text: water tastes great. easy to install with plumber. the faucet was not very high quality & didn't match our kitchen so i bought another one from grohe. very happy with the water filter though. compact in size but does a heck of a job filtering water without the big tank of RO & the water waste.
customer_reviews.author: QC Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: SLOW SLOW SLOW
customer_reviews.text: SLOOOOOOWWWWW, VERY SLOW. i called customer support and they indicated that I should be able to get a half gallon in 1 minute. No, it did not. Much slower than my old unit. I hope it improves over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Filters out a lot of pollutants
customer_reviews.text: Works good, better than the 2 stage I had before but bottled purified water tastes better....
customer_reviews.author: Mickbeme

customer_reviews.title: Patience.
customer_reviews.text: This was more complex to install than I expected, and it takes up most of the space beneath my bar sink. I had to run it quite a lot before the water ran clear. Now I am satisfied. I don't notice a taste difference, but I feel better about my water.
customer_reviews.author: D Malbec

customer_reviews.title: The fittings were bad and leaked all over while we were gone
customer_reviews.text: The fittings were bad and leaked all over while we were gone. Had to spend a lot to fix my house. Very poor design.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bandyopadhyay

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for you and for the enivlorment.
customer_reviews.text: Tap water never tasted as good! I have had this install for about a month, and use it for drinking and cooking. I replaced my plastic water bottles with glass bottles that I recycled from a favorite drink. I think that the filtered water taste better than any plastic water, that I pay for. Not to mention it's healthy for you. I would have given it 4 1/2 because I had to have a plumber install it, which cost about $75.00
customer_reviews.author: Ceit

customer_reviews.title: Filter Flow Rate
customer_reviews.text: The flow rate of this filter is slow at first but after water is run through it for about ten minutes the flow rate increases up to the advertised flow rate of 0.5 gpm. Initially the water is cloudy, but again after the initial ten minute run time that is mentioned in the installation guide the water clears up very nicely and tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F. Piasecki

customer_reviews.title: Compact and pretty easy to istall
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a bit difficult. The hoses that came with the product were not long enough for my application. Purchased an additional hose at minimal cost. Completed installation. Had a leak at first, but was able to fix that. Now will see how the filtered water tastes. Have not had the opportunity to do a complete taste test.
customer_reviews.author: Hardy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Water tastes good. Fairly easy to install. Haven't had too long but hopefully a great purchase! Great option over faucet pur system that kept falling off. Update. After 2+ years still happy we purchased! Attaching a pic of the sheet that came with our last replacement filters as people ask what it removes. We'd had those faucet attachment filters previously and haven't looked back since installing this with our kitchen remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca N H

customer_reviews.title: flooded my basement
customer_reviews.text: don't buy it, if you do be prepare to do a big reparation on your house by damage of flood. the filter housing exploded, read the review about it, other people it happened the same
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Renee Monte

customer_reviews.title: Slow flow
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. The filtered water tastes very good. We rated is down a bit because of the low flow. After using the filter one and 1/2 years, the flow is 0.3125 gpm. The unit is rated at 0.5 gpm. We have changed the filters once.
customer_reviews.author: Radio Tech

customer_reviews.title: Effective.  Faucet does not come with appropriate hardward.
customer_reviews.text: Highly rated. Water tastes good. The faucet that comes with it will be very difficult to install. Comes with strange hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Forestperson

customer_reviews.title: Clean water
customer_reviews.text: Not bad little expensive with The Replacements and all but if you want clean water a good product
customer_reviews.author: Robert Edinger

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy with the product and with customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with low flow. Contacted customer service and they sent me a new set of filters and that fixed the issue. Filters are easy to change, install very straight forward. Wish the spigot was a little taller and that is the only nit picky thing I can come up with. Quite happy with the product and with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Obscura

customer_reviews.title: REMOVES PFAS EASY INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: PFAS is the new water issue facing msny of us. This filter meets EPA 437 certification to remove PFAS. Received today, installed in 1 hour, very easy. Great product to ensure safe drinking water for me and my family.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Baize

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is just the right size for under the counter. It was easy to install through my granite counter top. The water tastes like no other water we have had. Now I know how much chlorine is added. This removes the chlorine. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: CoachDave

customer_reviews.title: Working well so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Water tastes fine and the install seemed pretty straightforward...no leaks so far. I am pretty picky about my drinking water and I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christene

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes noticeably better. Installation wasn't too bad.
customer_reviews.text: have had for about 8 months. Have replaced cartridges once at about 6 months. Had a reminder beep when cartridges need to be replaced. Water flows from the tap a little slower than I expected but not too bad for the money and not having to lug water 5 gallon bottles around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Houston, Tx

customer_reviews.title: Good product and Good maker
customer_reviews.text: I like this. Small size and filtering performance is really good.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product! I did research on water filtration systems and this was easy to install under the sink. I love the convenience of this so I have filtered water to use for cooking and drinking to save on bottled water.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne!!

customer_reviews.title: Filter is great. But the system leaks quite easily. SCARY.
customer_reviews.text: I've been dealing with multiple leakage problems with this system. The plastic casings are actually pretty delicate. I've had the first set replaced because of severe leakage. I've had some slight leakage with the current casing, but it seems to have stopped once I unscrewed it and rescrewed it. Definitely a concern for something that is installed inside a wooden kitchen cabinet we spent a chunk of money on. The filtration quality has been great, and that's why I've been sticking with it. But it definitely makes my wife and I nervous all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Philma

customer_reviews.title: Expensive filters
customer_reviews.text: The filters are almost as much as the whole setup. No option to buy just the cartridges. Only the whole canister. This triple system clogs less frequently than the double.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love,  love,  love!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were going through almost a gallon of store bought water a day. We decided we needed to make our tap water drinkable. This product is a life saver! We figure we will save a ton of money even this first year. The water looks clean and doesn't have any funny tastes. Would highly recommend to anyone who doesn't like their tap water.
customer_reviews.author: emjl2013

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: not sure how long the effectiveness will last so far its been a month and it's filtering out all smells and bad taste including salt residue from water softener
customer_reviews.author: AZSid

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Actually not that difficult to install and very compact. Couple months now and no problems. The water taste very good. Much better than bottled water. Should pay for itself in about 6 months based on our past bottled water usage.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Blum

customer_reviews.title: So far seems good. Compared to the reverse osmosis filters it is ...
customer_reviews.text: So far seems good. Compared to the reverse osmosis filters it is much simpler to hook up though we ended up with a leak because our water pressure into the house was 125 lbs, seems ok now that we replaced the water pressure regulator. You can taste the minerals in the water as stated in some of the ads for this unit. We are getting used to that. Glad we are not wasting water like we did with the RO unit we previously had. Only had the unit for about a month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Bobster

product_meta.title: Aquasana 3-Stage Under Sink Water Filter System - Kitchen Counter Claryum Filtration - Filters 99% Of Chloramine - Brushed Nickel - AQ-5300
product_meta.description:
Color:Brushed Nickel

Instant access to healthy water that keeps you and your family hydrated all day, every day. Removes up to 99% of 77 contaminants including lead, mercury, asbestos, pesticides, pharmaceuticals, chlorine, chloramines and more. Full system certified to NSF Standards 42, 53 + 401, and P473. The only system on the market with Claryum filtration technology that filters out harmful contaminants while retaining natural beneficial minerals like calcium and potassium. 

 Healthy water at only 9 cents per gallon the included sediment pre-filter increases performance capacity to give you a full 600 gallons of healthy water. Zero additives and zero waste - no water is wasted during the filtration process and no harmful contaminants are added back into the water. Drink healthier water and use for better tasting beverages like coffee, tea, and smoothies. Enjoy better tasting food - steamed vegetables, rice, boiled pasta, soups. Even your pet can now benefit from healthier water.

Includes stylish metal faucet that's 100% lead free. Choose from chrome, brushed nickel, or oil-rubbed bronze to match your kitchen decor. First set of filters, faucet, and all system parts included. DIY installment makes for easy installation. Replacements are a simple twist - keep your plastic housing and only toss the filter.
feature_bullets: Instantly Transform Ordinary Tap Water Into Clean Extraordinary Water - Removes up to 99% of 77 contaminants while leaving healthy minerals so you can drink with confidence This system will NOT reduce Total Dissolved Solids (TDS)
High Flow Rate - This system powers through a half-gallon of water every minute No need to wait for clean water compared to traditional drip filters
Cost Efficient & Long Lasting - The most economical filter on the market at less than 10 cents per gallon filtered Lasts for 6 months or 600 gallons before a replacement filter is needed
Easiest Filter Replacement - Replacements are engineered for ease No need to disconnect hoses or water lines housing easily twists off for snappy replacement!
Top-Grade Components - Includes first set of filter and all parts required for DIY Installation - No plumber required

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars719 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
